授業目的: The purpose of this class is for students to obtain basic knowledge for understanding US economy by using micro and macro economic theories.
到達目標: Students will be able to understand the follwoings: (1) how US economy had grown from the early 19th century, (2) how banking and finance systems and policies work or not work, and (3) how US corporate governance is different from Japan, and (4)wheter or not competition policy promotes economic efficiency.
